Question: Over the next seventeen days, this person had limited time for writing and finished the draft quickly.
Hints: This person began his childhood education under the direction of tutors at Tuckahoe along with the Randolph children.
Years before holding his first office, this person had spent much time researching procedures and rules for governing bodies.
In the following three weeks, this person shut himself in his room, where he paced back and forth until he was nearly exhausted.
